name: GLBA Safeguards Rule
description: Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act Safeguards Rule for Financial Institutions

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(1) - Access Controls
deliverables.description: Implement and periodically review access controls
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(2) - Data Inventory
deliverables.description: Identify and manage data, personnel, devices, systems storing customer information
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(3) - Encryption
deliverables.description: Encrypt customer information in transit and at rest
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%'

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(4) - Secure Development
deliverables.description: Adopt secure development practices for in-house applications
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SQL injection%' OR title LIKE '%XSS%'

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(5) - Multi-Factor Authentication
deliverables.description: Implement MFA for accessing customer information
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%MFA%'

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(6) - Data Disposal
deliverables.description: Secure disposal procedures for customer information

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(7) - Change Management
deliverables.description: Adopt change management procedures for modifications affecting security

deliverables.title: 314.4(c)(8) - Activity Monitoring
deliverables.description: Implement monitoring procedures to detect unauthorized access
